newsitem.title: SWITZERLAND: Swiss stage garden gnome festival.
newsitem.headline: Swiss stage garden gnome festival.

text.p: Switzerland, famous for its banker "gnomes of Zurich", this weekend staged its first-ever festival of garden gnomes in this picturesque lakeside town.
Gnomes of all shapes and sizes from all over the country were displayed in gardens and on the promenade along the shore of the Lake of the Three Cantons.

Largest of the exhibits, ranging from the common red- or green-capped gnome to varieties displaying the Swiss national flag, was a three-metre (nine foot) giant said to have his usual home in the grounds of a mountain villa.
Organisers said they hoped to attract international exhibitors to the festival in future years.
